attributes.title: Bright Beginnings! - Brandon, Jessica Lynn Verdi, Damiani
attributes.caption: Welcome to Mysterious Monsters the Trivia Game Show RPG!  Defeat monsters by answering questions, get gold, get loot, get out alive!
attributes.description: Welcome to Mysterious Monsters the Trivia Game Show RPG!  Defeat monsters by answering questions, get gold, get loot, get out alive!
attributes.display_title: Bright Beginnings! - Brandon, Jessica Lynn Verdi, Damiani

attributes.title: Items Vs Pure Grit! - Kyle Bosman, Don Casanova, Noah Rayne
attributes.caption: Will our three adventurers Kyle Bosman, Noah Rayne, and Don Casanova defeat the Mysterious Monsters?  Find out who comes out on top in this month's episode of the best monster themed RPG Trivia Game Show in town!
attributes.description: Will our three adventurers Kyle Bosman, Noah Rayne, and Don Casanova defeat the Mysterious Monsters?  Find out who comes out on top in this month's episode of the best monster themed RPG Trivia Game Show in town!  Special guest Noah Rayne is a musician and collaborator with eza, you may remember Noah from singing with Ian at the years 2 and 3 eza anniversary shows!
attributes.display_title: Items Vs Pure Grit! - Kyle Bosman, Don Casanova, Noah Rayne

attributes.title: Bloody Battle! - Daniel Bloodworth vs Husband and Wife Chris Nguyen and Pamela Tsing!
attributes.caption: This month our adventurers are pitted against particularly difficult monsters, who will prevail!  Mysterious Monsters is a trivia game show with RPG elements!
attributes.description: This month our adventurers are pitted against particularly difficult monsters, who will prevail!  Mysterious Monsters is a trivia game show with RPG elements!
attributes.display_title: Bloody Battle! - Daniel Bloodworth vs Husband and Wife Chris Nguyen and Pamela Tsing!

attributes.title: Total Chaos! - AJ LoCascio, Matthew Walden, Ben Moore
attributes.caption: Special guest adventurers AJ LoCascio (Voltron), Matthew Walden (Better Than Speed), and Ben Moore (Easy Allies) take on our monsters in this uproarious neck in neck battle!  Who will defeat the Mysterious Monsters!?
attributes.description: Special guest adventurers AJ LoCascio (Voltron), Matthew Walden (Better Than Speed), and Ben Moore (Easy Allies) take on our monsters in this uproarious neck in neck battle!  Who will defeat the Mysterious Monsters!?
attributes.display_title: Total Chaos! - AJ LoCascio, Matthew Walden, Ben Moore

attributes.title: Accidental Allies - Elyse Willems, Ashly Burch, Erica Lindbeck
attributes.caption: Ahoy adventurers!  This month the Mysterious Monsters go up against three very special guests!  Who shall emerge victorious?
attributes.description: Ahoy adventurers!  This month the Mysterious Monsters go up against three very special guests!  Ashly Burch, Elyse Willems, and Erica Lindbeck! Who shall emerge victorious?
attributes.display_title: Accidental Allies - Elyse Willems, Ashly Burch, Erica Lindbeck

attributes.title: Bitterest of Rivals! - Gabby Montoute, Uli Gurgel, Justin Yngelmo
attributes.caption: One of the craziest competitions yet on Mysterious Monsters, guests Uli, Justin, and Gabby fight tooth and nail against the monsters and each other, who will prevail!?
attributes.description: One of the craziest competitions yet on Mysterious Monsters, guests Uli, Justin, and Gabby fight tooth and nail against the monsters and each other, who will prevail!?
attributes.display_title: Bitterest of Rivals! - Gabby Montoute, Uli Gurgel, Justin Yngelmo

attributes.title: Bonds! - Brandon Jones, Amanda Troop, Jessica Lynn Verdi
attributes.caption: This month on Mysterious Monsters bonds are tested as it's Husband Brandon Jones vs Wife Amanda Troop vs Friend Jessica Lynn Verdi vs our fearsome freakos!  Who shall emerge victorious?
attributes.description: This month on Mysterious Monsters bonds are tested as it's Husband Brandon Jones vs Wife Amanda Troop vs Friend Jessica Lynn Verdi vs our fearsome freakos!  Who shall emerge victorious?
attributes.display_title: Bonds! - Brandon Jones, Amanda Troop, Jessica Lynn Verdi

attributes.title: Game Dev Showdown! - Asher Vollmer (Threes), Felix Park (Uncharted 4), Alex Belzer (God of War)
attributes.caption: This month three veteran game developers go head to head against our monsters and each other!
attributes.description: This month three veteran game developers go head to head against our monsters and each other!  Asher Vollmer (Threes, Puzzle Juice, Guildlings), Felix Park (Uncharted 4, Uncharted: The Lost Legacy), or Alex Belzer (God of War, Dungeon Punks, HauntAR)... who shall reign supreme!?
attributes.display_title: Game Dev Showdown! - Asher Vollmer (Threes), Felix Park (Uncharted 4), Alex Belzer (God of War)

attributes.title: Bad Boy Monster Daddies! - Tyler Hutchison, Kyle Bosman, Bradley Ellis
attributes.caption: Three bad boys fight monsters and each other!  Who will be the monster daddy?  Special Guest Tyler Hutchison of Dream Daddy!  With Kyle Bosman and Bradley Ellis!
attributes.description: Three bad boys fight monsters and each other!  Who will be the monster daddy?  Special Guest Tyler Hutchison of Dream Daddy!  With Kyle Bosman and Bradley Ellis!
attributes.display_title: Bad Boy Monster Daddies! - Tyler Hutchison, Kyle Bosman, Bradley Ellis

attributes.title: Easy Alliances! - Beth May, Ben Moore, Sean Clinton
attributes.caption: This month Beth May, Ben Moore, and Sean Clinton battle it out against our monsters and each other and use Uneasy Alliances to their full effect, but who shall emerge the victor?!
attributes.description: This month Beth May, Ben Moore, and Sean Clinton battle it out against our monsters and each other and use Uneasy Alliances to their full effect, but who shall emerge the victor?!
attributes.display_title: Easy Alliances! - Beth May, Ben Moore, Sean Clinton

attributes.title: Band Together! - Freddie Wong, Tamara Bruketta, Josh Wolf
attributes.caption: This month the band Dawn of Jayne takes on our monsters and each other!  Tamara Bruketta, Freddie Wong, and Josh Wolf, who will emerge victorious?!
attributes.description: This month the band Dawn of Jayne takes on our monsters and each other!  Tamara Bruketta, Freddie Wong, and Josh Wolf, who will emerge victorious?!
attributes.display_title: Band Together! - Freddie Wong, Tamara Bruketta, Josh Wolf

attributes.title: Titans! - Lawrence Sonntag, Bruce Greene, Michael Damiani
attributes.caption: Lawrence vs Bruce vs Damiani who will reign supreme in this battle of titans!?
attributes.description: Three titans of the games industry face off!  Lawrence Sonntag, Bruce Greene, and Michael Damiani go head to head to see who can defeat our fearsome monsters!
attributes.display_title: Titans! - Lawrence Sonntag, Bruce Greene, Michael Damiani

attributes.title: Battle of the Bots! - Alexa vs. Google vs. Siri - Bonus Episode
attributes.caption: Which bot will best battle our beasts!?
attributes.description: On this bonus episode of Mysterious Monsters its Alexa v. Google v. Siri to see which bot best battles our beasts!
attributes.display_title: Battle of the Bots! - Alexa vs. Google vs. Siri - Bonus Episode
